document_data.name: Thistle
document_data.mainbody: '''Thistle''' was a clerk who worked at the largest trading post in [[Phandalin]], [[Barthen's Provisions]], in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Thistle would mostly load and unload wagons full of trade goods. When the owner was not in the trading post, Thistle would attend the needs of the customers.
document_data.History:
The young clerk and his colleague, [[Ander (Phandalin)|Ander]], worked for [[Elmar Barthen]] in [[1491 DR]].{{Phandelver-time}}

Not long after the [[white dragon]] [[Cryovain]] rampaged through the region, Thistle met [[Velleen Firecrow]], a new assistant at the local [[Lionshield Coster]] [[Lionshield Coster (Phandalin)|outpost]], and took a liking to her. While trying to get to know her, Velleen began talking about her apocalyptic religious beliefs, which scared Thistle off. Unbeknownst to him, Velleen was an operative for the [[Cult of Talos]].
